subject: [ACTION REQUIRED] Seatsurfing: Confirm deletion of your Seatsurfing instance
headline: Hello {{recipientName}},
paragraphs: We've received a request to permanently delete your Seatsurfing instance “{{orgName}}”.

buttons.paragraph: PLEASE NOTE: Deleting the Seatsurfing instance includes permanently deleting all bookings, areas, spaces and users. No recovery will be possible! Click the button below to confirm this action.
buttons.label: Permanently delete instance

finalParagraphs: If you did not initiate the deletion of the Seatsurfing instance, you can safely ignore this email. We won't delete the instance if you don't click the link above.
